title: Cape Krusenstern National Monument: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       Park Regulations The Code of Federal Regulations and the Park Compendium provide a listing of rules and regulations that apply to Cape Krusenstern National Monument.  36 CFR parts 1 - 199 pertains to all National Park areas. 36 CFR part 13 pertains to all Alaska National Park areas. Subpart K of 36 CFR part 13 pertains to Special Regulations of Cape Krusenstern National Monument. 43 CFR part 36 contains access regulations for Alaska parks. The Park Compendium provides a listing of regulations under the discretionary authority of the superintendent. Other regulations such as Alaska fishing and hunting regulations may also apply.
